summary.span: 命名空间包含组件、控件以及支持集合、类和枚举，通过它们可以自定义几个 Microsoft Office 应用程序用户界面 (UI) 中的功能区。

span.span: The namespace contains components, controls, and supporting collections, classes, and enumerations that enable you to customize the Ribbon in the user interface (UI) of several Microsoft Office applications.
